name: Life of Spinosaurus - Survivor
description:
Only the strongest will survive. Every dino here is enemy and will try to fight with you - even the smallest ones. Give them fight back and prove that you are the master of this Era. With the simple and easy controls you can search for the next victim everywhere.

Key Features:
- Open World - explore endless forest environment !
- Lot of enemies - Triceraptor, Allosaurus, Diplodocus, Velociraptor, TRex Tyrannosaurus and more!
- Realistic 3D graphics
- You can earn experience, increase your xp level and so increase your dino-power!
